text: ahashida, bhūmiyehi æti dæyada, (mēvā atara æti dæyada, viśēṣayen) pakṣīnda, tamangē) at taṭu vihidā (piyām̆bamin) niyata vaśayenma allāhva suviśuddha karamin siṭina bava (nabiyē!) oba nuduṭuvehida? mēvā siyalla taman suviśuddha karamin næmadiya yutu ākārayaṭa niyata vaśayenma dænagenama siṭinnāha. allāhda ovun karamin siṭina dæya hon̆din danneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
